entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
